CommandBypasses.blacklist: Blocks the specified user from using any commands
CommandBypasses.all: Gives the user 'super access' to the bots music command and features, bypassing any votes
CommandBypasses.skip: The specified user can skip songs without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.stop: The specified user can stop music without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.queueremove: The specified user can remove songs from the queue without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.queueclear: The specified user can clear the queue without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.queuerepeat: The specified user can repeat queues without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.songrepeat: The specified user can repeat songs without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.queueshuffle: The specified user can shuffle queues without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.queueload: The specified user can load queues without the need of a vote
CommandBypasses.queuedelete: The specified user can delete queues without the need of a vote
